<h1 align="center">🎨 Paint Calculator 🎨</h1>
<p align="center">We calculate how many liters of paint it takes to paint your walls and suggest which paint cans you should buy to maximize your savings.</p>

<p align="center"><img src="https://github.com/LucasFelipeTimoteo/paint-calculator/blob/main/.github/gifs/Paint-Calculator.gif" alt="Paint Calculator"/></p>

## 🚀 Features
- Calculate total area of 4 walls
- Calculate how many windows and doors the walls will have
- Get total paint liters you need to paint the walls
- Get recommendation of paint cans to buy to maximize your savings

## 🛠️ Installation Steps

1. Clone the repository

```Bash
git clone https://github.com/LucasFelipeTimoteo/paint-calculator
```

2. Download dependencies
```Bash
npm install
```

## 🔥 Get Started

1. Start React app 
```Bash
npm start
```

## 🧪 Tests

1. Run unit tests
```Bash
npm test
```

2. Run integration/E2E tests
```Bash
npm run test:cypress
```

3. Run all tests (units and integration/E2E) at once
```Bash
npm run test:all
```

4. Tips
- Avoid running Integration/E2E tests if your Internet connection is not stable as this could result in unexpected errors
- Avoid interacting with the application from within the test browser while the integration/E2E tests are running
- To manually test some functionality, prefer to use the real application running in your browser
- If an Integration/E2E test unexpectedly failed try running the tests again

5. Integration/E2E interface (Cypress interface)
- When running the Integration/E2E tests, the following interface will appear:
![Cypress interface](https://github.com/LucasFelipeTimoteo/paint-calculator/blob/main/.github/images/cypress-interface.png)

- To run all integration/E2E tests at once, click in "Run Nº integration specs"
![Cypress interface to run all tests](https://github.com/LucasFelipeTimoteo/paint-calculator/blob/main/.github/images/cypress-interface-run-all-tests.png)

- To run specific tests, just choose from the list
![Cypress interface to run all tests](https://github.com/LucasFelipeTimoteo/paint-calculator/blob/main/.github/images/cypress-interface-run-specific-tests.png)

## 👷 Built with
- [React](https://reactjs.org/)
- [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/) (v14.15.4)
- [Typescript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/)
- [Material-UI](https://v4.mui.com/) (v4)
- [Cypress](https://www.cypress.io/)
- [Jest](https://jestjs.io/)
- [Yup](https://www.npmjs.com/package/yup)
